short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Group tab is a keyboard driven tab manager to allow you to manage multi page workflows with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Group Tab - Your Ultimate Keyboard-Driven Tab Manager!

Tired of getting lost in a sea of open tabs while juggling multiple tasks and workflows? Look no further than Group Tab, the ingenious tab management extension designed to streamline your browsing experience like never before. With Group Tab, you're in complete control of your tabs, all powered by the convenience of keyboard shortcuts.

üöÄ Effortless Multi-Page Workflows: Bid farewell to tab clutter! Group Tab empowers you to effortlessly manage and organize your tabs into logical groups. Seamlessly transition between different projects, research topics, or leisurely browsing sessions without missing a beat.

‚å®Ô∏è Keyboard-Centric Efficiency: Say goodbye to mouse-driven chaos. Group Tab is tailor-made for keyboard enthusiasts, offering an array of intuitive shortcuts to create, switch, and close tab groups. Navigate with lightning speed and reclaim your focus.

üìÇ Intuitive Tab Grouping: Create and label tab groups with a few swift keystrokes. Visually distinguishable labels ensure you never lose track of your projects. Whether it's for work, study, or leisure, your tabs are now effortlessly sorted.

üîç Quick Tab Search: Can't locate that vital tab in a densely populated group? Fear not! Group Tab's robust search functionality lets you locate specific tabs within groups in an instant. No more endless scrolling.


Discover a new level of tab organization and efficiency with Group Tab. Enhance your productivity, reduce frustration, and regain control over your browsing experience. Say hello to simplified multitasking ‚Äì install Group Tab today!

üåê Available Exclusively on Chrome Web Store: Group Tab is your companion for optimized tab management. Get started today and transform the way you browse!

P.S GroupTab is completly open source and intructions/docs on how to use + source code can be found at https://github.com/madrigal1/GroupTab
